K06D0027_H0028:263a-1: a'arya tsandra garbha pra dzny'ap'a ra mi t'a ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K06D0027_H0028:263a-3: 'phags pa zla ba'i snying po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K06D0027_H0028:263a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K06D0027_H0028:263a-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom
K06D0027_H0028:263a-7: ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri
K06D0027_H0028:263a-8: la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po tshad med
K06D0027_H0028:263a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K06D0027_H0028:263a-11: de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
K06D0027_H0028:263a-12: chen po zla ba'i snying po 'dug pa stan las
K06D0027_H0028:263a-13: langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
K06D0027_H0028:263a-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha
K06D0027_H0028:263b-0: rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab @263b par
K06D0027_H0028:263b-1: bgyi / de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K06D0027_H0028:263b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06D0027_H0028:263b-4: chos thams cad dngos po dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni /
K06D0027_H0028:263b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K06D0027_H0028:263b-9: rtog pa med kyang gling bzhir 'khor bar byed cing mun pa rnams rab tu sel to //
K06D0027_H0028:263b-10: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K06D0027_H0028:263b-11: po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
K06D0027_H0028:263b-12: spyod pa ni / rtog pa med kyang phyin ci
K06D0027_H0028:263b-13: log bzhi rnams la thugs rjes 'khor zhing rang bzhin
K06D0027_H0028:263b-14: gyis nyon mongs pa rnams sel bar byed kyang mi
K06D0027_H0028:263b-16: zla ba'i snying pos gsol pa /
K06D0027_H0028:263b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la du mchis /
K06D0027_H0028:263b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06D0027_H0028:263b-21: byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gnyis te /
K06D0027_H0028:263b-22: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
K06D0027_H0028:263b-25: de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab ni /
K06D0027_H0028:263b-26: mos pas spyod pa'i sa'i gnas skabs na gzung bar rtog pa dang /
K06D0027_H0028:263b-28: de spong bar byed pa ni /
K06D0027_H0028:263b-29: zag pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o; ;rigs kyi bu /
K06D0027_H0028:263b-30: de la zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
K06D0027_H0028:263b-31: mthong ba'i lam gyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes te /
K06D0027_H0028:264a-0: rtog pa thams cad dang bral @264a *//
K06D0027_H0028:264a-1: ba'i phyir na mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
K06D0027_H0028:264a-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
K06D0027_H0028:264a-5: pha rol dang tshu rol gyi mtha' gang la yang mi gnas pa'i phyir ro; ;shes rab ni /
K06D0027_H0028:264a-6: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rang bzhin med pas /
K06D0027_H0028:264a-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o //
K06D0027_H0028:264a-8: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams dus gsum du mi
K06D0027_H0028:264a-9: dmigs shing ma bcings ma grol bar shes par bya'o
K06D0027_H0028:264a-11: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas /
K06D0027_H0028:264a-12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do //
K06D0027_H0028:264a-13: chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas /
K06D0027_H0028:264a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do //
K06D0027_H0028:264a-15: chos thams cad mtshan ma med pas /
K06D0027_H0028:264a-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med pa'o //
K06D0027_H0028:264a-17: chos thams cad skye ba med pas /
K06D0027_H0028:264a-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa'o //
K06D0027_H0028:264a-19: chos thams cad chad pa med pas /
K06D0027_H0028:264a-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chad pa med pa'o //
K06D0027_H0028:264a-21: chos thams cad 'ong ba med pas /
K06D0027_H0028:264a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba med pa'o //
K06D0027_H0028:264a-23: chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa nyid pas /
K06D0027_H0028:264a-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gro ba med pa nyid do //
K06D0027_H0028:264a-25: chos thams cad rtag pa med pas /
K06D0027_H0028:264a-26: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag pa med pa nyid do //
K06D0027_H0028:264b-0: chos thams cad tha dad pa @264b med pa nyid pas /
K06D0027_H0028:264b-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa med pa nyid do //
K06D0027_H0028:264b-2: chos thams cad don gcig pa nyid pas /
K06D0027_H0028:264b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don gcig pa nyid do //
K06D0027_H0028:264b-4: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid pas /
K06D0027_H0028:264b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
K06D0027_H0028:264b-6: mdor na thams cad mtshan ma dang /
K06D0027_H0028:264b-8: ngo bo nyid las 'das pas ni; shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K06D0027_H0028:264b-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags so //
K06D0027_H0028:264b-15: sarba sh'a sa ka ri sv'ah'a /
K06D0027_H0028:264b-16: chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung //
K06D0027_H0028:264b-17: de nyid kun rdzob bden pa ste //
K06D0027_H0028:264b-18: rang bzhin med cing spros med pa //
K06D0027_H0028:264b-19: de nyid don dam spyod yul lo //
K06D0027_H0028:264b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K06D0027_H0028:264b-21: byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying po dang /
K06D0027_H0028:264b-22: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang /
K06D0027_H0028:264b-26: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom
K06D0027_H0028:264b-27: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do
K06D0027_H0028:264b-28: // 'phags pa zla ba'i snying po shes rab kyi
